dboperations
Class DBoperations

java.lang.Object
  dboperations.DBoperations

public class DBoperations
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used perform database related operations. currently it is using xml file format but this layer can be changed without changing other part of the application. it also contains several list to maintain highly accessible data in ram.

Parameters:

userID - user to be added to the group
groupName - group in which user is going to be added
isNewGroup - to distinguish between new and old group
